snippet.title: Abridge | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Abridge is an abstract, Sokoban puzzle game. Select pieces to move, pull and shift them around into a goal. The colorful shapes on them determine their movement and abilities. Remove them all from the board to solve these hand-crafted, challenging puzzles.

Wishlist Abridge and follow on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1594290/Abridge/
Follow on itch.io: https://aaron7eleven.itch.io/abridge
Support on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/aaron7eleven

Additional Abridge Videos
Triangle Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5NvtICirUjI
Square Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rblWdTCGc5E
Diagonal Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5hxaUHtL4tA
Circle Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V-iCw58tWHk

In-Game Music
"Breathing" by Keys of Moons Music
https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon/breathing-chillout-background-music-free-download
